text: Arpit Narechania was named as one of the Graduate Teaching Fellows for 2023-24! Congratulations, Arpit!
Arpit Narechania received the national CIRTL associate and Tech to Teaching certificates by CIRTL and CTL.
Our lab presented our latest work at ACM CHI 2023 in Hamburg, Germany!
Arpit Narechania and Adam Coscia presented posters at the 2023 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. They won travel awards!
Arpit Narechania, Grace Guo, and Adam Coscia presented at the annual GVU research showcase.
Our lab presented our latest work at IEEE VIS 2022 in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, USA!
Grace Guo and Adam Coscia presented their work at a meeting of the NSF AI Institute for Adult Learning and Online Education (AI-ALOE).
